description: Discover the best hotels in Frankfurt, Germany. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Frankfurt City Break near Airport
hotels.description: Discover the best of one of Germany’s most vibrant cities with a stay at Crowne Plaza Frankfurt Congress Hotel, an IHG Hotel, positioned just minutes from Niederrad’s Deutsch Bank Park Arena and the Frankfurt Airport. After days spent exploring Frankfurt’s restored Old Town, Old St. Nicholas Church or the iconic Alte Oper, head to \"L44\" for laidback cocktails or Frankfurter Stube for cosy al fresco dining overlooking the vast greenery of the City Forest.

hotels.title: Central Frankfurt Riverside Haven with Onsite Bar and Restaurant
hotels.description: Welcome to Frankfurt's most rebellious hideaway at 25hours Hotel The Goldman. Each room has its own story, think creative interiors, comfortable beds and quirky details. Whether you're chilling in the lounge or renting a bike to cruise the city, it's a spot that makes you feel right at home. Located in Frankfurt's edgy Ostend district, you're a quick stroll from Main River and some of the city's coolest hangouts. Grab a cocktail at Oost Bar, kick back at ISOLETTA Restaurant and sample southern Italian cuisine, rent a bicycle or stay energised in the 24/7 fitness centre.

hotels.title: Stylish Frankfurt Travel-Themed City Break with Rooftop Terrace & Finnish Sauna
hotels.description: Discover a playful haven in Frankfurt’s Bahnhofsviertel district with a stay at this funky retreat that transforms travel and discovery into an interior art form. Each level of the hotel is an expedition - from the Arctic to the tropics - while rooms offer vibrant, retro design and thoughtful amenities, curated to ensure a blissful stay in the city. Sample mouthwatering Middle Eastern creations at BAR SHUKA and end each evening with sake-based cocktails at SHUKA BAR. Revitalise at the rooftop wellness area, complete with a Finnish sauna, workout zone, and relaxation nooks, while Studio 54 offers spaces to work or gather creatively. Borrow a bike to cycle along the Main River or stroll to nearby cafes and the Kunstareal.

hotels.title: Apartment-Style Living in Central Frankfurt with City Skyline Bar
hotels.description: Nestled within Frankfurt's iconic Westend Gate tower, this chic aparthotel is your ideal launchpad for discovering the city. Perfectly situated near the Congress Center and just steps from the Festhalle Messe metro station, Frankfurt's main attractions are within easy reach. Unwind with a cocktail at the panoramic Skylinebar, where Frankfurt's cityscape stretches out before you, or make the most of the onsite fitness centre to keep up with your routine. Explore nearby attractions like Goethe-Haus, Palmengarten, and Experiminta, all just minutes away.

hotels.title: Contemporary Frankfurt Self-Contained Apartments with Onsite Bar & Restaurant
hotels.description: Be perfectly situated to discover Frankfurt's leafy West End at the Adina Frankfurt Westend. Discover beautiful heritage facades and the iconic Palmengarten just a stone's throw away; indulge in Frankfurt's culinary scene with nearby Michelin-starred restaurants, or enjoy a nightcap at the hotel's chic bar. Return to your plush suite to unwind, encapsulating the perfect blend of comfort and elegance.
